title: "AD" Fizz
body: I just had two games where the enemy Fizz has built Attack Damage. Is this sort of a troll trend?

replies.body:
its not troll.. its really strong.


Ult someone then proceed to do 20% more damage with 300AD % bork

> [{quoted}](name=Machet,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=N06swIa2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-19T05:33:05.771+0000)
>
> its not troll.. its really strong.
> 
> 
> Ult someone then proceed to do 20% more damage with 300AD % bork

{{item:3153}} {{item:3078}}  Agreed >

idk if it's a troll or not,
but actually i have seen AD fizz top in competitive play. Forget which game though
Not remotely a troll thing. AD Bruiser Fizz is now his most viable role, because high attack speed allows him to proc his W active on-hit effect very quickly.
He also deals dual type damage so it shreds tanks no matter what. Very annoying.
Not really, He basically becomes Jax, but with 2 jump abilities and more evasion.
It's actually kind of stronger than AP Fizz I heard, especially when you build {{item:3153}} paired with his W. Kind of works well too as AD jungler.

It's stupidly strong. My Favorite build is..
